scripts.build: npm run allnordstrom && npm run outfits && npm run checkout
scripts.allnordstrom: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/AllNordstrom.js | uglifyjs -o dist/AllNordstrom.js
scripts.beautyboard: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/BeautyBoard.js | uglifyjs -o dist/BeautyBoard.js
scripts.beautystylist: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/BeautyStylist.js | uglifyjs -o dist/BeautyStylist.js
scripts.careers: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/Careers.js | uglifyjs -o dist/Careers.js
scripts.chatentry: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/ChatEntry.js | uglifyjs -o dist/ChatEntry.js
scripts.chatwindow: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/ChatWindow.js | uglifyjs -o dist/ChatWindow.js
scripts.checkout: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/Checkout.js | uglifyjs -o dist/Checkout.js
scripts.myaccount: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/MyAccount.js | uglifyjs -o dist/MyAccount.js
scripts.outfits: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/Outfits.js | uglifyjs -o dist/Outfits.js
scripts.product: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/Product.js | uglifyjs -o dist/Product.js
scripts.searchresults: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/SearchResults.js | uglifyjs -o dist/SearchResults.js
scripts.shopmystore: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/ShopMyStoreDirectionsModal.js | uglifyjs -o dist/ShopMyStoreDirectionsModal.js
scripts.shoppingbag: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/ShoppingBag.js | uglifyjs -o dist/ShoppingBag.js
scripts.storedetail: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/StoreDetail.js | uglifyjs -o dist/StoreDetail.js
scripts.storelocator: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/StoreLocator.js | uglifyjs -o dist/StoreLocator.js
scripts.storeopenings: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/StoreOpenings.js | uglifyjs -o dist/StoreOpenings.js
scripts.supportemailentry: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] pages/SupportEmailEntry.js | uglifyjs -o dist/SupportEmailEntry.js
